eventSummary: ST Engineering is suspected to have been targeted by a cyberattack.
A user reported being unable to withdraw their crypto from Gemini.
The exchange BigONEexchange was exploited due to a supply chain attack, resulting in losses exceeding $27 million.

Users are reporting issues with Coinbase, including being logged out of accounts, verification problems, and receiving phishing emails attempting to obtain their 12-word phrase. There are also reports of scammers impersonating CoinMarketCap members and calling users.
1,410 BTC, valued at $164,795,874 USD, was transferred from an unknown wallet to Galaxy Digital.
There is a reported pixel litigation risk at financial institutions.
